name: Balloon Rush 2
description:
Oh no! A lot of sharp and evil things try to prevent you from keeping your favorite balloon off the ground.
Delay the inevitable fate of these poor balloons, destined to be popped.

Controls
Create gusts of wind by clicking near the balloon. Hold the click to create stronger gusts.

Leaderboards
Our game uses leaderboards! Try to survive the longest to make it to the top 3!

Credits
- Stefan Laimer (@stefan-laimer): Programming and Game Design
- Antoine Thiry (@cocapasteque): Art and Music
